room_title: Escape room "Illusion de Magician" by EscapeOut Folsom in Sacramento
review: We did the magic room and it was amazing! Ed was our host and he was awesome! Ask for hints if you need them... they won't tell you outright but give you enough to steer you the right way. We will be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Illusion de Magician" by EscapeOut Folsom in Sacramento
review: We did the I'illusion de Magicien room today and had an amazing time. It's only one room but the set up and story were really well put together. We had an amazing time and were able to solve the puzzle. I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Illusion de Magician" by EscapeOut Folsom in Sacramento
review: We did a team-building event yesterday in the Magician room and had an absolute blast!! The puzzles were challenging but fun, and your excitement just grows each time you figure out a clue! Very well-done, we definitely want to return!!
